title: Unchained Memory
description: Three hours ripped away her past. His love promised her the future.  From the night she wakes up in her pickup on the side of the road, three hours gone and everything of value lost to her, Asia Burdette is caught in a clash of invisible forces. She has only one ally in her struggle to understand why--Ethan Roberts, a man she shouldn't love, a psychiatrist who risks everything to help her.  With black ops kidnappers dogging their trail, the lovers race to navigate a maze of mind control, alien abduction and interstellar slavery. If they keep following the signs, they'll find a battle that's been raging since the first silver saucer was spotted in the skies above Earth.
author: Donna S. Frelick
